name: Only 20 People
description:
• A game for GameMaker 20 Jam. using GameMakerStudio2 engine.

You are a Human Resources of hell.

There is a rule, ONLY 20 PEOPLE(or less) can go to heaven.

The FIRES OF HELL will be generated randomly.

Your job is moving people to be burned(or not to be).

Keep as many people as you can, win the high scores.

Controls

MoveArrowResetR

Team Members

  • All by  Noto
